scale_copyright.title: Copyright Information
scale_copyright.professional_contact_desc: Initiate professional license contact request through xCOA platform
scale_copyright.usage_requirements_placeholder: Please provide detailed information about your usage requirements, project background, and other relevant details...
scale_copyright.auto_email_note: We will automatically generate a professional contact email that you can send directly to the copyright holder
scale_copyright.can_use_directly_title: This scale can be used directly
scale_copyright.can_use_directly_desc: You can use this scale directly while complying with copyright notices, no additional license required.
scale_copyright.needs_permission_desc: Please contact the copyright holder for usage license. We recommend providing detailed usage purpose and project background.
scale_copyright.contact_tip_1: • Provide detailed usage purpose and project background
scale_copyright.contact_tip_2: • Include your professional institution information and contact details
scale_copyright.contact_tip_3: • Inquire about specific license requirements and possible fees
scale_copyright.contact_tip_4: • Understand license validity period and usage scope limitations
scale_copyright.faq_academic_q: Q: Is academic research use free?
scale_copyright.faq_academic_a: A: Most scales provide free or discounted licenses for academic research, please contact copyright holders to confirm.
scale_copyright.faq_commercial_q: Q: What is the typical cost for commercial use licenses?
scale_copyright.faq_commercial_a: A: Costs vary by scale and usage scope, ranging from hundreds to tens of thousands of yuan. Please consult copyright holders directly.
scale_copyright.faq_time_q: Q: How long does license application typically take?
scale_copyright.faq_time_a: A: Generally 1-5 business days for response, complex commercial licenses may take 2-4 weeks.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.academic_research_free: Q: Is academic research use free?
faq.academic_research_answer: A: Most scales provide free or discounted licenses for academic research, please contact copyright holders to confirm.
faq.commercial_license_cost: Q: What is the typical cost for commercial use licenses?
faq.commercial_license_answer: A: Costs vary by scale and usage scope, ranging from hundreds to tens of thousands of yuan. Please consult copyright holders directly.
faq.license_application_time: Q: How long does license application typically take?
faq.license_application_answer: A: Generally 1-5 business days for response, complex commercial licenses may take 2-4 weeks.

landing.hero_subtitle: Comprehensive eCOA scale database with AI powered search, licensing contact & management. Language translation & validation services.
landing.yes_this_template_is_completely_free: Yes, this template is completely free and open source! You can use it for both personal and commercial projects without any licensing fees. You can fork, copy, modify, and distribute it as you see fit without any restrictions and attribution.
landing.template_includes_comprehensive_features: The template includes a comprehensive set of features:
landing.authentication_with_email_password: Authentication with email/password and forgot password flow
landing.database_integration_drizzle_d1: Database integration with Drizzle ORM and Cloudflare D1
landing.email_service_react_email_resend: Email service powered by React Email and Resend
landing.modern_ui_components: Modern UI components from Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS
landing.template_uses_modern_reliable_technologi: The template uses modern and reliable technologies:
landing.nextjs_15_app_router: Next.js 15 with App Router and React Server Components
landing.tailwind_shadcn_styling: Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI for styling
landing.drizzle_d1_database: DrizzleORM with Cloudflare D1 for database
landing.react_email_templates: React Email for beautiful email templates
landing.how_do_i_deploy_my_application: How do I deploy my application?
landing.deployment_is_automated: Deployment is automated with GitHub Actions. You'll need to:
landing.create_cloudflare_d1_kv: Create Cloudflare D1 and KV namespaces
landing.setup_resend_email: Set up Resend for email service
landing.add_cloudflare_token_secrets: Add your Cloudflare API token to GitHub secrets
landing.deployment_process_documented: The deployment process is fully documented in the GitHub repository.
landing.what_do_i_need_to_get_started: What do I need to get started?
landing.need_cloudflare_account: You'll need a Cloudflare account (free tier is fine), Node.js installed locally, and basic knowledge of React and TypeScript. The template includes detailed documentation to guide you through the setup.
landing.check_documentation: You can also check out the documentation for more information.
landing.exciting_roadmap_ahead: We have an exciting roadmap ahead! Planned features include:
landing.can_i_preview_email_templates: Can I preview the email templates?
landing.yes_run_email_dev: Yes! Run bun email:dev and open http://localhost:3001 to preview and edit the email templates. They're built with React Email for a great developer experience.
landing.how_do_i_customize_template: How do I customize the template?
landing.before_deploying_production: Before deploying to production, you should:
landing.optionally_update_color_palette: Optionally update the color palette in src/app/globals.css
landing.contributions_welcome: Contributions are welcome! Feel free to open issues, submit pull requests, or help improve the documentation on GitHub. The project follows standard open source contribution guidelines.
landing.features_description: Comprehensive eCOA scale solutions for clinical research and medical practice
landing.feature_ai_search_description: Intelligent search based on natural language processing to quickly find the most suitable scale tools
landing.feature_rich_library_description: Professional scale resources covering multiple medical fields including psychology, neurology, oncology, etc.
landing.feature_data_analysis_description: Provides detailed scale statistical data and usage trend analysis reports
landing.feature_collaboration_description: Supports team collaboration, researchers can share and discuss scale usage experience
landing.feature_security_description: Enterprise-level security protection to ensure privacy and security of patient data and research results
landing.feature_deployment_description: One-click deployment to clinical environment, seamless integration with existing systems
landing.ai_demo_description: Our AI system can understand your needs and intelligently recommend the most suitable scale tools. Whether by disease type, assessment goals, or patient population, it can quickly match.
landing.cancer_quality_input: Scales for assessing quality of life in cancer patients
landing.eortc_desc: European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire
landing.fact_desc: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy - General
landing.feature_interpretation_description: Provides comprehensive guidance on scale usage, scoring methods, and result interpretation. Helps clinicians and researchers use and interpret assessment results correctly.
landing.feature_cases_description: Curated real clinical cases classified by specialty and difficulty level. Provides practical references to enhance professional scale application.
landing.feature_copyright_description: Professional copyright licensing application service, assisting users in contacting copyright holders to ensure compliant scale usage and avoid legal risks.
landing.feature_support_description: Provides scale selection recommendations, research design consultation, and data analysis guidance to comprehensively support clinical research projects.
landing.faq_scales_coverage: What clinical assessment scales does xCOA platform include?
landing.faq_copyright_compliance: How to ensure copyright compliance when using scales?
landing.faq_interpretation_content: What content does the scale interpretation guide include?
landing.faq_cases_value: How does the clinical case library help improve practice level?
landing.faq_scale_selection: How to choose appropriate assessment scales?
landing.faq_data_security: How does the platform ensure data security and privacy?
landing.faq_user_types: What user types and usage scenarios does the platform support?
landing.faq_support_service: How to get technical support and professional consultation?

pricing.title: Choose the Right Subscription Plan
pricing.description: From professional research to enterprise deployment, we offer flexible pricing plans to meet different scale needs

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Perfect for professional research teams and mid-size institutions

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Perfect for large healthcare institutions and research organizations

custom.name: Custom
custom.description: Tailored for special requirements and large-scale deployments

can_cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
can_cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods are supported?
payment_methods.answer: We support various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, bank transfers, and more.

enterprise_services.question: What custom services are included in the Enterprise plan?
enterprise_services.answer: Includes private deployment, custom development, dedicated training, and one-on-one services.

data_security.question: How is data security ensured?
data_security.answer: We use bank-level encryption technology and comply with GDPR and domestic data protection regulations.

cookie_consent.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, provide personalized content and advertisements, analyze site traffic, and understand where our visitors come from. By clicking "Accept All Cookies", you agree to our use of all cookies. You can visit our
cookie_consent.preferences_description: You can choose which types of cookies to accept. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are critical for the website to function properly.
cookie_consent.necessary_description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of these cookies.
cookie_consent.functional_description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
cookie_consent.analytics_description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.
cookie_consent.marketing_description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.
